<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 8"
    pfs=""
>
[Call Ursine Ally](/Feats.aspx?ID=4089) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Primal" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=134" />
<trait label="Summoning" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=154" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 184 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Ursine Avenger Hood](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=200)

**Frequency**
once per hour

</column>

---

You can cast a 3rd-level [_summon animal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=316) as an innate spell, but only to summon a [black bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=566). At 10th level, the _summon animal_ spell is heightened to 4th level, and you can summon a [grizzly bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=47). At 12th level, your _summon animal_ innate spell is heightened to 5th level, and you can summon a [polar bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=567). At 14th level, it's heightened to 6th level, and you can summon a [cave bear](/Monsters.aspx?ID=48).
name: Call Ursine Ally
